system.useTime:
Destitute: -1 from the Group's starting Profit Factor.
A Gaze to Pierce the Soul: Start with "Gaze into the Abyss" Navigator Power, may raise this ability above Master to rank "Paragon" for same cost as raising to Master level, giving +30 to tests with power.
Mercantile Opportunitists: Gain +10 to Barter, Charm, and Carouse Skills.
Initial Mutation: Begin with a single Navigator Mutation, rolled randomly. Additional mutations may be gained when new Powers or Mastery is gained.
